Phoneme pair weights
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


.. py:module:: langsim.modules.cognates.phoneme_pair_weights


Fetch phoneme pair weights from different initialization methods and present them to
cognate identification in a consistent way.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :titlesonly:

   langsim.modules.cognates.phoneme_pair_weights.embedding_sim
   langsim.modules.cognates.phoneme_pair_weights.overlap
